name: rtl-reader
title: RTL Reader
description:
This extension fixes formatting issues in texts that mix Right-to-Left (RTL) and Left-to-Right (LTR) languages, like Kurdish and English.

Instead of opening a separate app just to read a piece of text, you can paste it here to instantly display it correctly. It's perfect for quick reads without needing to edit or save.
author: xoshbin

commands.name: rtl-text
commands.title: RTL Text Formatter
commands.subtitle: Format text for RTL reading
commands.description: Format text containing RTL and LTR languages for proper display

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
